title._content: Image taken from page 161 of 'Los Aborígenes de América. Disquisiciones acerca del asiento, origen, historia y adelanto en la esfera científica de las sociedades precolombinas. Con un prólogo del general D. Vicente Riva-Palacio y Guerrero'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Los Aborígenes de América. Disquisiciones acerca del asiento, origen, historia y adelanto en la esfera científica de las sociedades precolombinas. Con un prólogo del general D. Vicente Riva-Palacio y Guerrero" Author: DELORME SALTO, Rafael. Contributor: RIVA-PALACIO Y GUERRERO, Vicente. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10408.cc.35." Page: 161 Place of Publishing: Madrid Date of Publishing: 1894 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000902888 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
